      • editRow

        private void editRow(int row,
                     java.lang.String url)
        Called to edit information of a video when an new video is added from another class. Requires the URL to be specified before hand.
        Parameters:
        row - an integer representing the index of the new row to be created
        url - a String representing URL location of video file in cloudinary server

      • editRow

        private void editRow(int row)
        Called to enter information of new video or to edit info of existing video
        Parameters:
        row - an integer representing the index of the new row to be created or the index of the currently selected row

      • newRow

        private void newRow()
        Called to add video to database

      • deleteRow

        private void deleteRow(int row)
        Deletes selected row/video in application. Does not persist changes into database.
        Parameters:
        row - an integer represents index of the selected row/video

      • save

        private void save()
        Persists changes in application into database

      • refresh

        Refreshes application gui to reflect database table
